languages.text: {n}Маражай осклабляется.{/n} "Ты создал{mf||а} условия для того, чтобы я {d|Encyclopedia:CompMarazhai_Free}не знал отказа{/d} ни в одном своем желании. Твой экипаж чует мою власть над ними и боится меня — я купаюсь в их страхе каждый раз, когда ступаю на мостик. Хорошо. Скот должен знать свое место".

{n}Marazhai smirks.{/n} "You saw to it that {d|Encyclopedia:CompMarazhai_Free}not one of my wishes would be refused{/d}. Your crew sense my power over them and fear me — I bathe in their terror every time I set foot on the bridge. Good. Livestock should know their place."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай осклабляется.{/n} "Ты создал{mf||а} условия для того, чтобы я {d|Encyclopedia:CompMarazhai_Free}не знал отказа{/d} ни в одном своем желании. Твой экипаж чует мою власть над ними и боится меня — я купаюсь в их страхе каждый раз, когда ступаю на мостик. Хорошо. Скот должен знать свое место".

{n}Marazhai smirks.{/n} "You saw to it that not one of my wishes would be refused. Your crew sense my power over them and fear me — I bathe in their terror every time I set foot on the bridge. Good. Livestock should know their place."

{n}Marazhai smirks.{/n} "You saw to it that not one of my wishes would be refused. Your crew sense my power over them and fear me — I bathe in their terror every time I set foot on the bridge. Good. Livestock should know their place."

{n}Marazhai smirks.{/n} "You saw to it that {d|Encyclopedia:CompMarazhai_Free}not one of my wishes would be refused{/d}. Your crew sense my power over them and fear me — I bathe in their terror every time I set foot on the bridge. Good. Livestock should know their place."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai sonríe, burlón.{/n} «Te has encargado de que {d|Encyclopedia:CompMarazhai_Free}no se me niegue el más mínimo deseo{/d}. Tu tripulación puede sentir el poder que ostento sobre ella y me teme. Cada vez que piso el puente, me doy un baño de terror. Excelente, el ganado debe conocer su lugar».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai smirks.{/n} "You saw to it that {d|Encyclopedia:CompMarazhai_Free}not one of my wishes would be refused{/d}. Your crew sense my power over them and fear me — I bathe in their terror every time I set foot on the bridge. Good. Livestock should know their place."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai sonríe, burlón.{/n} «Te has encargado de que no se me niegue el más mínimo deseo. Tu tripulación puede sentir el poder que ostento sobre ella y me teme. Cada vez que piso el puente, me doy un baño de terror. Excelente, el ganado debe conocer su lugar».

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋得意地笑了起来。{/n}“你确保{d|Encyclopedia:CompMarazhai_Free}我所有的愿望都得到了实现{/d}。你的船员感觉到我的力量远远强于他们，对我充满了恐惧。每当我踏上舰桥，都会沐浴在他们的恐惧之中。这很好，牲畜就该摆正自己的位置。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai smirks.{/n} "You saw to it that {d|Encyclopedia:CompMarazhai_Free}not one of my wishes would be refused{/d}. Your crew sense my power over them and fear me — I bathe in their terror every time I set foot on the bridge. Good. Livestock should know their place."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋得意地笑了起来。{/n}“你确保我所有的愿望都得到了实现。你的船员感觉到我的力量远远强于他们，对我充满了恐惧。每当我踏上舰桥，都会沐浴在他们的恐惧之中。这很好，牲畜就该摆正自己的位置。”

languages.text: {n}マラズハイがニヤリと笑う。{/n}「{d|Encyclopedia:CompMarazhai_Free}俺の願いがすべて受け入れらるよう努力してくれたようだな{/d}。船員たちは俺の力が彼らを支配していることを感じ取り、俺を恐れている。ブリッジに足を踏み入れるたびに彼らの恐怖を感じるよ。素晴らしい。家畜は自分たちの立場を理解していなければな」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai smirks.{/n} "You saw to it that {d|Encyclopedia:CompMarazhai_Free}not one of my wishes would be refused{/d}. Your crew sense my power over them and fear me — I bathe in their terror every time I set foot on the bridge. Good. Livestock should know their place."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイがニヤリと笑う。{/n}「俺の願いがすべて受け入れらるよう努力してくれたようだな。船員たちは俺の力が彼らを支配していることを感じ取り、俺を恐れている。ブリッジに足を踏み入れるたびに彼らの恐怖を感じるよ。素晴らしい。家畜は自分たちの立場を理解していなければな」

languages.text: {n}Marazhai sourit.{/n} « Vous avez veillé à {d|Encyclopedia:CompMarazhai_Free}combler mes moindres désirs{/d}. Les membres de votre équipage ont conscience du pouvoir que j'exerce sur eux et ils me craignent. Je baigne allègrement dans leur terreur chaque fois que je fais une apparition sur le pont. C'est bien. Le bétail doit savoir rester à sa place. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai smirks.{/n} "You saw to it that {d|Encyclopedia:CompMarazhai_Free}not one of my wishes would be refused{/d}. Your crew sense my power over them and fear me — I bathe in their terror every time I set foot on the bridge. Good. Livestock should know their place."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai sourit.{/n} « Vous avez veillé à combler mes moindres désirs. Les membres de votre équipage ont conscience du pouvoir que j'exerce sur eux et ils me craignent. Je baigne allègrement dans leur terreur chaque fois que je fais une apparition sur le pont. C'est bien. Le bétail doit savoir rester à sa place. »

languages.text: {n}Marazhai grinst.{/n} "Ihr habt dafür gesorgt, dass mir {d|Encyclopedia:CompMarazhai_Free}keiner meiner Wünsche verwehrt wird{/d}. Eure Crew spürt meine Macht über sie und fürchtet mich – ich bade jedes Mal in ihrer Angst, wenn ich die Brücke betrete. Gut. Vieh sollte seinen Platz kennen."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai smirks.{/n} "You saw to it that {d|Encyclopedia:CompMarazhai_Free}not one of my wishes would be refused{/d}. Your crew sense my power over them and fear me — I bathe in their terror every time I set foot on the bridge. Good. Livestock should know their place."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai grinst.{/n} "Ihr habt dafür gesorgt, dass mir keiner meiner Wünsche verwehrt wird. Eure Crew spürt meine Macht über sie und fürchtet mich — ich bade jedes Mal in ihrer Angst, wenn ich die Brücke betrete. Gut. Vieh sollte seinen Platz kennen."

languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai smirks.{/n} "You saw to it that not one of my wishes would be refused. Your crew sense my power over them and fear me — I bathe in their terror every time I set foot on the bridge. Good. Livestock should know their place."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai sırıtıyor.{/n} "Sayende {d|Encyclopedia:CompMarazhai_Free}hiçbir isteğim geri çevrilmiyor{/d}. Tayfandakiler, üstünlüğümün farkında. Benden korkuyorlar. Köprüye her ayak basışımda kapıldıkları dehşet beni mest ediyor. Olması gereken de bu... Hayvanlar, hayvanlığını bilecek."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai smirks.{/n} "You saw to it that {d|Encyclopedia:CompMarazhai_Free}not one of my wishes would be refused{/d}. Your crew sense my power over them and fear me — I bathe in their terror every time I set foot on the bridge. Good. Livestock should know their place."
